mapper.select: select * from STATION_TB order by station_id ASC
select * from(select ROWNUM rn, st.* FROM (select * from STATION_TB order by station_id) st) where station_name like '%' || #{stationName} || '%'
select ROWNUM rn, st.* FROM (select * from STATION_TB where station_company=#{category}) st where station_company = #{category} and station_name like '%' || #{stationName} || '%'
mapper.update: update STATION_TB set station_name=#{station_name}, addr_do=#{addr_do}, addr_sigun=#{addr_sigun}, addr_detail=#{addr_detail}, station_company=#{station_company}, manager_id=#{manager_id}, service_date=#{service_date}, CHARGER_NO=#{charger_no} where station_id=#{station_id}
